blocks.text: The first paragraph is manually marked up as an "introduction", which renders it in bold.
The next paragraph isn't marked up in any way - it's just "normal".

Paragraphs can contain <bold>bold </bold>and <italic>italic </italic>in CPS at the moment, and these are rendered on the page as <bold>bold </bold>and <italic>italic</italic> or <bold><italic>both</italic></bold>.
<bold><italic>Bold and italic can also be rendered together.</italic></bold>
This is a normal paragraph again.

Longer paragraph of normal body text. Longer paragraph of normal body text. Longer paragraph of normal body text. Longer paragraph of normal body text. Longer paragraph of normal body text. Longer paragraph of normal body text. Longer paragraph of normal body text. Longer paragraph of normal body text. Longer paragraph of normal body text. Longer paragraph of normal body text. Longer paragraph of normal body text. Longer paragraph of normal body text. Longer paragraph of normal body text. Longer paragraph of normal body text. Longer paragraph of normal body text. Longer paragraph of normal body text. Longer paragraph of normal body text. Longer paragraph of normal body text. Longer paragraph of normal body text.
A grey line appears after a subheading.

This is a paragraph with an <link><caption>inline link</caption><altText>Link</altText><url href="https://www.bbc.co.uk/news/uk-scotland-north-east-orkney-shetland-51190283" platform="highweb"/></link> to an internal site. Here's a link to an <link><caption>external site</caption><altText>Google</altText><url href="http://www.google.com" platform="highweb"/></link>.
More normal paragraph text. The body image below doesn't have a caption, but does have copyright.
Social embed examples below for Twitter, YouTube and Instagram.

oembed.title: 1917 was the big winner at the Bafta Film Awards, winning seven prizes in total, including best film, best British film, best director and best cinematography. Joker star Joaquin Phoenix was named best actor, while Renee Zellweger was recognised for her portrayal of Judy Garland. Tap the link in our bio to read more about all of the winners at the 2020 Bafta Film Awards. #Baftas #film #awards #BBCNews
oembed.html:
View this post on Instagram

Tap the link in our bio to read more about all of the winners at the 2020 Bafta Film Awards. #Baftas #film #awards #BBCNews

headlines.shortHeadline: El inquietante arte de fotografiar a los muertos
headlines.headline: El inquietante arte de fotografiar a los muertos

promo.summary: Fotografiar a los seres queridos después de que han muerto es algo que puede parecer morboso en la actualidad. Sin embargo, en la Inglaterra victoriana, esa era una forma de honrar a los difuntos y mitigar la pena causada por el duelo.

headlines.shortHeadline: Zika en Panamá
headlines.headline: Hallan zika en el cordón umbilical de un recién nacido en Panamá

promo.summary: Panamá registró este sábado el primer caso de microcefalia posiblemente relacionada con el virus zika, según confirmó el Ministerio de Salud de ese país.

indexImage.caption: Se sabe con certeza que el mosquito Aedes aegypti es la vía principal de transmisión del virus zika, que está presente en al menos 24 países y territorios en América.
